As a lover of e-learning I founded a team, what we call BETACOACH, where every week different participants explain some relevant aspect of their knowledge and where discussions are always welcome.

Learn is my passion and if in the process I meet awesome people, the experience is bigger. Events and Hackathons are the best place to link really smart people each other, for that reason I try to keep an eye into this events.
Here are my top 6 events I had the opportunity to be.

You have an amazing event and you need speakers or volunteers. Whether it is large or small, You contact me and I will try to help.

Friends are always welcome. If you have an idea, you want to know me better or just drink a beer. Don't forget your name...
